title: Piracy - actual and attempted attacks worldwide by country 2019
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of incidents for 7 number of Countrys.
The maximum Number of incidents 35.0 is found at Country Nigeria and the minimum is found at Venezuela where Country is 6.0.
The highest Country Nigeria has 29.0 more Number of incidents than the lowest Country Venezuela.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Number of incidents in the y axis.
The Number of incidents is highest at Country Nigeria and lowest at Country Venezuela.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of incidents for 7 number of Countrys.
The maximum Number of incidents 35.0 is found at Country Nigeria and the minimum is found at Venezuela where Country is 6.0.
The highest Country Nigeria has 29.0 more Number of incidents than the lowest Country Venezuela.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Number of incidents in the y axis.
The Number of incidents is appeared to be the highest at Country Nigeria and lowest at Country Venezuela.
Second maximum Number of incidents is found at Country Indonesia.
The difference of Number of incidents between the highest and lowest Country is 29.0.
Country Nigeria is higher than any other Countrys with value 35.0, followed by Indonesia, and Singapore Staits. Down to Country Venezuela with the lowest value 6.0.
Similar Number of incidents is found in Country Venezuela, and Cameroon.
The lowest value 6.0 at Venezuela is almost 2.33 times smaller than the average value 15.0.
Summing up the values of all Countrys, we get total 105.0.
